lines.content: ### _A personal assistant chatbot that helps users manage and track tasks._

> "It is our attitude at the beginning of a difficult task which, more than anything else, will affect its successful outcome." ‚Äì William James ([source](https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/william_james_157168))
Start your task easily and boost your productivity with CaCa ü§ñ, a chatbot which frees your mind ü§Ø of having to remember and keep track of overwhelming things you need to do! ‚úÖ
All you need to do is,
2. open a command window in that same folder.
- e.g., `java -jar caca.jar` (i.e., run the command in the same folder as the jar file)
4. let it manage your tasks for you! üòâ
- [x] Managing tasks (add, delete, mark, unmark, list, find)
Look out for more features in future! üòé
If you Java programmer, you can use it to practice Java too. Here's the `main` method:
### Here are the detailed description of CaCa features.
Functions with respective commands are listed below as Function (description): `command`. e.g...
- Greet user (triggered as soon as the chatbot is run)
- ToDos (tasks without any date & time): `todo taskDescription`
- Deadlines (deadlines by a date & time): `deadline taskDescription /by dateTime`
- Events (events at a date & time): `event taskDescription /at dd/MM/yyyy HHmm`
- List task (displays a list of all tasks stored): `list`
- Mark task (marks task as done with a "X"): `mark taskIndex`
- Unmark task (marks task as not done and removes "X"): `unmark taskIndex`
- Delete task (deletes task from list): `delete taskIndex`
- Find task (finds all matching tasks from list): `find task`

* CaCa is a personal assistant chatbot that helps users manage and track things.
* It greets user, reads and stores user input,
* allows user to add and delete tasks, update task status as done or undone,
* displays all tasks with status and exits when user inputs bye.

* This class contains CaCa's task list.
* The list of operations that CaCa can perform with the tasks are listed below as

*
  • ToDos (tasks without any date & time): todo taskDescription

*
  • Deadlines (deadlines by a date & time): deadline taskDescription /by dd/MM/yyyy HHmm

*
  • Events (events at a date & time): event taskDescription /at dd/MM/yyyy HHmm

*
  • List task (displays a list of all tasks stored): list

*
  • Mark task (marks task as done with a "X"): mark taskIndex. e.g. mark 2

*
  • Unmark task (marks task as not done and removes "X"): unmark taskIndex. e.g. unmark 2

*
  • Delete task (deletes task from list): delete taskIndex. e.g. delete 3

*
  • Find task (finds all matching tasks from list): find task. e.g. find book
* An array to store the list of tasks input by user.

* Controller for MainWindow. Provides the layout for the other controls.
* Initialises the main window for chatbot.
* Sets CaCa instance and displays greeting message to user.
* Displays quick start to CaCa when user clicks "Quick Start" button.
* Displays detailed guide to CaCa when user clicks "Detailed Guide" button.
* Exits the program and close the main window.
* Creates two dialog boxes, one echoing user input and the other containing Duke's reply
* and then appends them to the dialog container. Clears the user input after processing.
* This class deals with interactions with the user.
* Greets user with CaCa logo and greeting.
+ "Welcome to CaCa's world!\nWhat can I do for you?\n";
* Displays a quick start to guide users with the commands in CaCa.
String quickStartMessage = "*****A quick start guide to CaCa*****\n"
+ "todo, deadline, event, list, mark, unmark, delete, find, bye.";
* Displays a detailed command list to guide users with all the commands in CaCa.
* @return A list of all the commands in detail.
String detailedCommandsMessage = "*****A comprehensive guide to CaCa*****\n"
+ "* list: displays a list of all your tasks.\n"
